data.name: SALVATIONLAND
data.detailed_description:
An alternate future after a global flood.
A young wasteland traveller named Victor went to northern mountains in searching of 'city of dreams' from old times. Having reached a human settlement, he realizes that he's trapped - it's impossible to escape back from this place. Moreover, the city turns out to be divided into two parts: ordinary people live in the first, and the second, in which the "chosen ones" live, is surrounded by a large fence. The desire to find his place in the cradle of surviving mankind turns into a series of dizzying events for him, during which he'll have to unravel the secret plans of the mad city mayor and become a local hero...


  • Unique post-flood setting and original atmosphere,
  • The author's story and interesting quests, uncovered the game world with different directions,
  • Increased difficulty of the gameplay,
  • Elements of a survival sim and fishing mechanics,
  • Spacious locations in the middle of the waters and mountains, available for exploration,
  • The mysterious but omnipresent main villain and the ending of the story that tears off all the veils.

data.short_description: Deciding to find the "city of dreams", young traveller from the wasteland named Victor went to northern mountains by the old railway tracks. The desire to find his place in the cradle of surviving mankind turns into a struggle against an evil mayor and transformation into a hero-liberator...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 x86
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz dual core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 640 1 GB (with OpenGL 4.1 support)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8.1 x64
  • Processor: 4-core quad-thread processor 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750 Ti 2GB (with OpenGL 4.1 support)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

content_descriptors.notes: Includes scenes of violence and blood.
